summary: qualcomm showed off its vision of the connected home at mobile world congress in barcelona .   devices inside the home - from an intelligent wine cooler to a smart teddy - can be linked together and controlled using smartphone apps .   all the products included are sold by individual companies , or have been developed by the california-based firm so they run alljoyn software .   the house is secured by a phone-operated august smart lock and a camera connected to lights can alert home owners to intruders .
